message: A) Undocumented immigrants aren't eligible for any government benefits B) They contribute to our economy through purchasing goods, paying taxes, (sales, state, and federal) and keeping the cost of goods like produce affordable. C) If you actually look at US immigration statistics over the last few years, they have been going down. The wall won't do anything significant. Since there are already other established pathways (boats, tunnels, overstaying a visa) into the US, someone to determined to get in would just use another method. Before you tout Trumps brilliance, you should do your own research.
